summary: An Ordinance of the City of Seattle granting an extension of time to Watson Allen, and others, to maintain the railway spur track or siding built and operated under Ordinance No. 12377, approved May 9th, 1905, entitled as follows, to wit, "An Ordinance authorizing the Board of Public Works to issue a permit to Watson Allen, and others, to construct a spur siding in the eastern portion of Railroad Avenue, between Dearborn Street and Connecticut Street".
